studio.title: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa

movies.title: Mandela: Long Walk to Freedom
movies.plot: A chronicle of Nelson Mandela's life journey from his childhood in a rural village through to his inauguration as the first democratically elected president of South Africa.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 32 nominations.

studios.title: Industrial Development Corporation of South Africa

events.title: Nelson Mandela gives a 3 hour speech in court
Nelson Mandela and his colleagues are found guilty
Nelson Mandela is transferred to Robben Island
Nelson Mandela is moved to Pollsmoor Prison
Nelson Mandela is freed from prison
Nelson Mandela is voted in as president of South Africa

movies.title: Hotel Rwanda
movies.plot: Inspired by true events, this film takes place in Rwanda in the 1990s when more than a million Tutsis were killed in a genocide that went mostly unnoticed by the rest of the world. Hotel owner Paul Rusesabagina houses over a thousand refuges in his hotel in attempt to save their lives.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 16 wins & 45 nominations.
